properties.name: operation
properties.description: Post a message to a channel or a direct message

options.name: Post Message
options.description: Post a message to a channel or a direct message

properties.name: channel
properties.description: The channel name with the prefix in front of it

properties.name: text
properties.description: The text of the message to send, is optional because of attachments

properties.name: options
properties.description: This will cause the message’s name to appear as the given alias, but your username will still display

options.name: alias
options.description: This will cause the message’s name to appear as the given alias, but your username will still display

options.name: avatar
options.description: If provided, this will make the avatar use the provided image URL

options.name: emoji
options.description: This will cause the message’s name to appear as the given alias, but your username will still display

properties.name: attachments
properties.description: The color you want the order on the left side to be, any value background-css supports

options.name: color
options.description: The color you want the order on the left side to be, any value background-css supports

options.name: text
options.description: The text to display for this attachment, it is different than the message’s text

options.name: ts
options.description: Displays the time next to the text portion

options.name: thumbUrl
options.description: An image that displays to the left of the text, looks better when this is relatively small

options.name: messageLink
options.description: Only applicable if the timestamp is provided, as it makes the time clickable to this link

options.name: collapsed
options.description: Causes the image, audio, and video sections to be hiding when collapsed is true

options.name: authorName
options.description: Name of the author

options.name: authorLink
options.description: Providing this makes the author name clickable and points to this link

options.name: authorIcon
options.description: Displays a tiny icon to the left of the Author’s name

options.name: title
options.description: Title to display for this attachment, displays under the author

options.name: titleLink
options.description: Providing this makes the title clickable, pointing to this link

options.name: titleLinkDownload
options.description: When this is true, a download icon appears and clicking this saves the link to file

options.name: imageUrl
options.description: The image to display, will be “big” and easy to see

options.name: audioUrl
options.description: Audio file to play, only supports what html audio does

options.name: videoUrl
options.description: Video file to play, only supports what html video does

options.name: fields
options.description: Whether this field should be a short field

values.name: short
values.description: Whether this field should be a short field

values.name: value
values.description: The value of this field, displayed underneath the title value

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
